thank_you.title: Thank you for your request!
thank_you.thank_you_description_html: We've received your order. You will be contacted shortly through {{ email }} to schedule a pick up date and time.
thank_you.confirmed_description_html: We've received your order. You will be contacted shortly through {{ email }} to schedule a pick up date and time.
thank_you.confirmed_description:
We've received your order. If you have schedule a Home or Business pick up, we will contact you shortly to schedule your pick up. If you have scheduled a Tenant pick up, we will arrive during your building's next pick up date.
To prepare for pick up:
1. Place all wire together
2. Remove used toner from boxes and seal in a plastic bag
3. Seal all loose batteries in a bag
4. Remove manuals, paper and all cardboard packaging from ewaste
5. Place ewaste in one central location for our driver.
thank_you.thank_you_description:
We've received your order. If you have schedule a Home or Business pick up, we will contact you shortly to schedule your pick up. If you have scheduled a Tenant pick up, we will arrive during your building's next pick up date.
To prepare for pick up:
1. Place all wire together
2. Remove used toner from boxes and seal in a plastic bag
3. Seal all loose batteries in a bag
4. Remove manuals, paper and all cardboard packaging from ewaste
5. Place ewaste in one central location for our driver.

shipping.title: Pick up region (home & business pick ups only)
